description:
This Course provides training for Primavera Risk Analysis Tool or Pertmaster, as it is popularly called. You will be able to gain a background about the basic idea of Risk Management.

The Course starts with a brief description of Risks and some important terminology used in Risk Management. It leads you through examples in the analysis tool to get a thorough understanding of Risk Tool.

Course contains over 34 lectures which cover almost all aspects of Primavera Risk Analysis Tool (Pertmaster).

Course shall be useful for project managers, risk engineers, schedulers and project planners.
title: Primavera Risk Analysis (Pertmaster) Training.
